mapper.sql: id, orderId, hsId, chukuDate, locality, chukuAmount, chukuPrice, tsc
mapper.select:
select
from hs_cang_chuku where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted=0
mapper.insert: insert into hs_cang_chuku (id, orderId, hsId, chukuDate, locality, chukuAmount, chukuPrice, tsc) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{chukuDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{locality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chukuAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{chukuPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into hs_cang_chuku
id, orderId, hsId, chukuDate,
locality,
chukuAmount,
chukuPrice,
tsc,

mapper.update: update hs_cang_chuku set orderId = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, hsId = #{hsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, chukuDate = #{chukuDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, locality = #{locality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, chukuAmount = #{chukuAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, chukuPrice = #{chukuPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, tsc = #{tsc,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} and delete=0
UPDATE hs_cang_chuku SET deleted = 1, tsu = current_timestamp WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT} and deleted=0
